name: GameDevBlogFeed
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Quickly check to get the latest news from the Amazon GameDev Blog. This skill checks the blog's RSS feed hourly to keep up to date with the latest postings from https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/gamedev/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
